login.title: Login
login.reset_password: If you forgot your password, click here

reset_password.title: Reset password
reset_password.notice: A password reset link will be sent to your registered email address.
reset_password.confirm_message:
We have sent a password reset link to the email address you entered.
Please reset your password as instructed.
reset_password.set_new_password:
Please set a new password.
The old password cannot be used for the new password.
reset_password.confirm_password_placeholder: Please enter a new password ( Confirmation )
reset_password.helper_text_password: * Password and Confirm Password must be the same
